header.name: Language
header.p: The process by which children come to understand and communicate language during early childhood.

header.name: Articulation
header.p: The movement of the tongue, lips, jaw, and other speech organs in order to make speech sounds.

header.name: Social
header.p: The skills we use to communicate and interact with each other, both verbally and non-verbally, through gestures, body language and our personal appearance.
